title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 804.8 - Review by employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 804.8 - Review by employer

State Regulations
(a) The determination of the commissioner under this Part shall be deemed a final
order under section
27-a
of the Labor

Law, subject to review by the Industrial Board of Appeals pursuant to the
provisions of section
101
of the Labor Law
on a petition filed by the employer. (b) An employer seeking review of the
determination shall have the burden of proving that such employer has made a
good faith effort to comply with the abatement requirement of the citation and
that abatement has not been completed because of factors beyond the employer's
control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
804.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
